### This file contains the list of words to be ignored by spell check

### Arduino terms and libraries

arduino
ino
onewire
SoftwareSerial
LiquidCrystal
DHTesp
digitalWrite
xxxxxx
millis

# My Terms

AJAXControls
AJAXEngine
mathertel
Matthias
Hertel
